p: Green bean samples were weighed immediately after (drying in a laminar airflow hood for 2 h) and at every sampling time to measure weight loss by using a digital laboratory scale. Another set of the green bean samples of 250 g each in triplicates) were used for further chemical analysis. To determine general appearance, the following scale was used: 9 = excellent, 7 = very good, 5 = good, 3 = poor, and 1 = unacceptable. The appearance score was assessed by a group of three trained laboratory panelists.
